title: Girls Night OUT - Mix and Mingle in San Jose with Women
text:
Do you sit at home weeknights wishing there was a place to meet women in the South Bay?

Do you wish you had the time to find a friend or maybe more?

Are you too shy to go out alone?

Well here's your chance! Thursday Night, March 3rd I would like to invite the women of our community to join me and others for an informal happy hour.

Come lounge around with us at "55 South" located at 55 South 1st St located about 300 feet from Splash bar. "55 South" is a lovely cocktail and wine bar offering enjoyable absolutely delicious appetizers. They know how to REALLY make a "Moscow Mule " and Mac & Cheese here!

This is a safe place to meet and mingle with women without the stress of having to carry the conversation! Come one, come all and enjoy a fun night of drinks, dinner and conversation with like-minded gals like you. You never know you might actually like it!

NOTE: I would kindly like to request our communities support in advertising this event, and really getting the word out there. If there is enough interest, this may become a monthly event and more. Feel free to share with your friends , post on Facebook, MeetUp Groups, and other email lists. 

Come on. . . grab your friends and let's have some fun!


PLEASE RSVP

title: Androgynous & Nerdy
text:
So, this may sound pretty weird but I am so tired of dating and meeting people who 1) have some sort of catch (they're married, not over their ex, or are pregnant..I know I have bad luck with women apparently) 

I'm REALLY looking for someone to settle down with. I am 23 but have an old soul, I know what I want and who I am, I've done all my partying in my teen years (quite a lot, over it). The problem is I keep meeting people who aren't ready to settle down, or don't have the ultimate goal of getting married. I don't mean to sound unattractive by complaining, I just want to make the point that I am seeking a woman who is willing to pursue me in the hopes of settling down with me (WITHOUT crazy baggage). 
I'm going to be up front, if I like you I'm not very good at taking things slow. I like affection, I like reminding my girl how amazing she is all the time and apparently that is too much for some people to handle. I fall hard, which I recognize is a flaw but am seeking someone who is equally excited about me as I am them. Someone passionate, a hopeless romantic like myself. 

Now that we have that out of the way..

About me: 
23 
Full time employed by a MAJOR social networking site (not going to post which one, but feel free to ask) 
Introverted, I prefer snuggling up and watching a movie to clubbing any day. 
Enjoys being called daddy in bed (Just to get that out of the way haha) 
REALLY into physics, philosophy, psychology and deep conversations 
Working on getting sleeve tattoos, I have some big ones on my arms already.
5''6 
I do volunteer work, I love to help others!
Really (and obviously) sick of the dating scene. I am sure I will get some smart ass emails, but whatever. 
I love to write and read! #Nerd power
I play guitar, used to be in a punk band. 
Suuuuper romantic. 


If you're looking for someone who doesn't play games and is ready for something real and long term (and you think we'd be a good match) email me with a photo and some information about yourself. Let's go on a date! 

I'm really into androgynous women, so points if you fit that!

title: Different connections
text:
I'm looking for some lesbian, bi girl friends (ok, straight girls welcome too). In a relationship or single is OK with me. Just looking for different types of connections: platonic friends, fwb, hiking buddy, book nerd, weekend trip friend, texting only friend, etc. I'm pretty open minded so let's chat and see if there's a connection and see where it goes. Life is too short not to explore options. Plus, there are so many wonderful people in this world that it would be a shame not to try and meet someone new every once in a while. 

I'm 34, Mexican, femme to sporty spectrum, have a 4 year degree and a great career that I love. I enjoy hiking, random road trips and adventures, massages(giving and receiving), running, concerts, museums, trying new restaurants or recipes, I like going out (trust me...I can still party pretty hard), but I prefer intimate nights in with no TV, no cell phone, no distractions....just me and my friend being present, in the moment, and getting to know each other on a deeper level. 

Age is not important to me. It's what's inside that matters and if there's a connection. However, I have a weak spot for Latinas and other women of color with tomboy to feminine qualities who are curvy (at or above a size 8/10 and no more than size 18/20). 
If interested, send me a message and we'll see where this goes. Or reach me at Four 1Five, 6Eight _nine, eighty '99! 

Willing to travel around the Bay area for the right connection. I love exploring new places & enjoy driving. 

Women only 
No M/F couples 
Open to F/F couples 

Thanks for reading.

title: Let's meet
Looking to shareShare a lovely 2 bed condo in Belmont ..April move in
text:
I am a lesbian and looking to share a bright and private 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment. The apartment is located in San Mateo, a short distance from the Hillsdale Caltrain Station, Highway 101 & Highway 92. I posted here but am not looking to date my room mate; only get the word out to a broader lesbian audience as this is a fabulous deal I think! :-)
The move-in date is April 1, 2016 [no fooling]; the monthly rent is ~ $1,600, this includes shared utilities.The leasing office does require running a background check which is $42. The leasing period is 15 months.
You would just need to furnish your own bedroom and some things in the living and kitchen area if need be.
I have 2 cats, I enjoy swimming, biking, long walks along the beach, visiting with friends & family, and new adventures. I am easy going and do enjoy privacy at times. If you are interested in talking about this opportunity, please respond to this posting. Thank you!

title: Nothing crazy here. A girl-friend is all I ask.
text:
Hey girls! Just looking for one person to hang out and chat with. I am attracted to girls but since I've only been to the States for a year and a half, I don't have many female friends, which I realize guys can't substitute. So I thought I'd give CL a try. 

I'd like to get to know someone who's drug-free, easy-going, friendly, open-minded and active. Because I myself am. And whom I could call out on a dance party or a dinner time cooking at my/your place, who I could visit frequently and talk about random stuff and about life and family. I am very open-minded and stable, I love new experiences and learning new things. Although I am not particularly looking for sexual experience, I'd like to keep that open if there's real chemistry. I prefer you're around my age, active, in shape. Most importantly, someone who enjoys life and lots of positive energy. 

I like being in nature, hiking, excercising and just being active in general, I'm a competitive swimmer and I like doing lots of arts and music and a variety of other stuff. My strength is that I never get depressed over long period of time, I always seem to manage to make myself happy. I love singing, dancing, writing (songs), playing the guitar/piano/drum. I'm talented at doing most things but haven't seem to find something I'm truly passionate about that make me want to stick with. I'm a very positive person.

Anyway, I'd love to hearing back from you gals! Get back to me with a picture of your pretty self and a brief introduction to your self, including what do you love to do on weekends. AND... your favorite country to visit and why. Please be willing to meet in person, as I'm not into cyber friends. *without info above will be ignored. one-liners, men, perverts don't waste time replying

And yep that's me in the picture. I'm from China, speak Mandarin, English fluently, learning Spanish, French. Plus if you speak another language.

title: Just searching
text:
Might as well state off the bat, to weed out unnecessary responses ha: I know this is a women seeking women ad, but no I don't want to be your curiosity satisfying, experimental lesbian fling.. so if that's what you want you should probably look elsewhere. Kay, great, now that's out of the way...

Hmm. never really know where to start with these.. name maybe? Yeah name is good. My name is Sarah. :P Kind of hard to summarize yourself, but I'll start with a few fun facts- I'm thoughtful, good-natured, bit of a goofball, I love conversing about pretty much anything from lighthearted to in depth so long as the dialogue flows, though awkward conversations can be fun and memorable as well. I'm a nature loving, ocean diving, animal loving flower child, and I enjoy a variety of music, so if you want a conversation starter feel free to ask about that- or be brave and tell me what you like first. :) Either way. I have a broad variety of activities I like, including but not limited to- hiking, swimming, daydreaming, reading, doodling, etcetera. I can be a pretty balanced blend of active and couch potato, which side comes out usually depends on who I'm hanging with. Anywho, I'm on here cause work is a bit of a time consumer, a big one actually, and its hard to meet up with people organically, hence giving this a go. I'd like to have someone special, or just new friends in general, to share new experiences with. Plus it'd be fantastic to meet more folks who fall under the lgbtq umbrella, though its cool to meet straight peeps as well, so long as you're engaging and all around respectful then it won't matter. I'm open to friends, a fwb's situation, or maybe a romantic partner, depending how we click. So if you feel we could potentially hit it off in any of these departments, don't be shy to message. Or, if you're naturally shy but feel a strong urge to contact me, then seize the moment bashful one! Haha. I'm pretty approachable, yunno, like I said, so long as you're respectful and all that jazz.. aka just don't be a jerk and we'll be cool. x)

When it comes to romantic/sexual interests, I'm looking for women ONLY, I can't stress that enough, but I feel like I have to press this, based on men trying to hit me up for dates and/or hookups, despite my interests being crystal clear. Guys, this is a woman seeks woman ad, c'mon now, you're barking up the wrong tree here. 

Moving on, where romantic interests are concerned, I'd like to talk to someone who is passionate about something, has some self confidence, someone who has a decent sense of humor, knows how to be respectful, is naturally an affectionate soul, and likes to go on adventures. Someone who is very comfortable with who they are. Looks wise I am not incredibly particular, I like an array of body types but mainly my attention is captivated by engaging personality and a cute face. :) I am on the thicker/curvier side so whoever is interested from a dating standpoint needs to be ok with that. 

Friends: Can be of any sex: anyone who can appreciate a sarcastic sense of humor and can give it back, in a fun and playful way, not a snide way. Someone who is supportive, real, laid back but also likes to go on adventures, as well. 

Deal breakers for me when it comes to romantic interests: Cigarette smokers, taking hard drugs, bad hygiene, lack of imagination/compassion/honesty. While we're on the topic of honesty- please be honest and communicative in regards to STD's, if we spend time and it reaches the point where intimacy seems like a likelihood between us. I'd prefer it to be a risk free experience entirely, but I understand fully that shit happens, and there's ways to play it safe under these circumstances. For the record I am clear in this area, and am willing to provide proof affirm this. 

Other deal-breakers, for FRIENDS, OR ROMANTIC INTERESTS: Having a sexist, violent, racist, or really, derogatory in any way, type of mindset. Just. Nope. Tryina steer clear of negativity here, folks! 

&,

If you are interested in seeing if a friendship or more can be sparked here, please send me a photo of you (keep it pg please,) along with the headline of "FRIEND" if you are interested in friendship, and "SOMETHING MORE" if you think we could have some chemistry, so I know you are real and I know what you are seeking. also I will be more eager to respond if you do this, cause it'll show you read my information and are actually interested in details. heads up, if you don't send me a picture i'll be less inclined to respond if we're being honest.

Additionally, please only message me if you are in or near Milpitas/San Jose or can make the trip here, ideally though I'd like to establish good connections with peeps (friends or otherwise,) that are in my area. To clarify, if you are interested in more than friendship, the age range I'm willing to date is 20-30... in some cases, 35 at the oldest. Please take that into account.

Another thing to take into account when messaging, make it a message that's worth replying to! I've had some thoughtful responses, but I've gotten my fair share of hi's and hey's, one worded responses don't do much for me. :P 

Thanks guys, let's make something happen here. :) 

Peace and well wishes. 



p.s. Dudes, if you send me a dick pic I will just laugh and proceed to delete it. Really, not trying to be harsh, but sending one to begin with is awkward especially in this context, and you would get nothing positive out of it. Again just to to reiterate, i'm open to a friendship with you if you are male however I'm only interested in dating women. 

p.s.s. I would like to disclose (since this has caused some confusion and conflict, though i don't know why) I identify as pansexual, feel free to look up the definition and ask me about it if you are confused, however if you are disrespectful about it we aren't going to get along. I am attracted to various genders and personalities, but at this point in time, i'm ONLY interested in women romantically, and I don't see that changing. Girls, if you are interested in me, great, but don't try to get me to change my orientation, or look down upon it. Guys, don't look at it as an opportunity to try to get in my pants cause it's not happening. Aaaand yeah, that long side note about covers it. Haha. 



do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
post

title: Girls Night OUT - Women's Mix and Mingle TONIGHT Downtown San Jose

Do you sit at home weeknights wishing there was a place to meet women in the South Bay?

Do you wish you had the time to find a friend or maybe more?

Are you too shy to go out alone?

Well here's your chance! Thursday Night, March 3rd I would like to invite the women of our community to join me and others for an informal happy hour.

NOTE: I would kindly like to request our communities support in advertising this event, and really getting the word out there. If there is enough interest, this may become a monthly event and more. Feel free to share with your friends , post on Facebook, MeetUp Groups, and other email lists.

I prefer you're around my age, active, in shape. Most importantly, someone who enjoys life and lots of positive energy. 

I like being in nature, hiking, excercising and just being active in general, I'm a competitive swimmer and I like doing lots of arts and music and a variety of other stuff. My strength is that I never get depressed over long period of time, I always seem to manage to make myself happy. I love singing, dancing, writing (songs), playing the guitar/piano/drum. I'm talented at doing most things but haven't seem to find something I'm truly passionate about that make me want to stick with. I'm a very positive person.

Anyway, I'd love to hearing back from you gals! Get back to me with a picture of your pretty self and a brief introduction to your self, including what do you love to do on weekends. AND... your favorite country to visit and why. Please be willing to meet in person, as I'm not into cyber friends. *without info above will be ignored. one-liners, men, perverts don't waste time replying

title: So...
text:
I guess this is where I tell you about myself and do my best to try and stand out from the rest of the people on here, right? Lol

I should start out by pointing out that I've never posted on here but my best friend keeps insisting that I "put myself out there". So here's my attempt, fellow Craigslisters. 

I'm 22, Mexican American/Italian. White, green eyes, blonde hair, chubby fella with an awkward stance. 
Did that paint a picture in your head about me already? Good. Let's proceed. 

I'd say I'm more "dudeish" I know there's right terms for these things. But I'm fairly new to this all so feel free to educate me on the correct terminology over coffee sometime? :p

But okay, I guess I can be girly sometimes. Rarely though. I'm more of a band tee/button up and skinny jeans sort of girl. 

Did I lose you already? I hope not, bear with me 'cause my thoughts are scattered all over the place and I suck at writing "about me's". 

At the moment, I currently have my own place, a car, going to school, employed, and I would say I have my shit together. 
I just lack that intimacy and that special someone by my side. 

I've never actually been with a girl. I've never even kissed a girl. Or well, that's a lie, I kissed one when I was in 6th grade and that's when I knew girls were for me. Lol

I'm a fairly reserved person, closed off and I keep my walls up. I'm not trying to throw myself a pity party here but I've been hurt a good amount of times and it's just closed me off to the ideas of relationships, ya know? But I feel like I'm ready. I feel like I'm open to meeting someone special that I can share my time with. I feel like that's one of the most valuable things you could give someone. 
You're never gonna get that back, so, spend it with the right person. 

I wouldn't say I'm an introvert because I do love to socialize but only with certain people. I'm a small group sort of girl. I'm into going to book stores, getting coffee, going to shows like punk shows, rock shows, indie shows. Road trips. Hiking. 
I have a pit bull whom I'd say is my son haha. I adore that dog to no end. I'm definitely an animal lover. Did you know cows love to be cuddled? I was watching this dude cuddle cows on tumblr today and it was really cute. 
Cuddle a cow with me so I know it's real. Lol jk. 

I have an awkward sense of humor, I apologize too much, and I'm really affectionate but you won't really see any of these things till I let my walls down with you. 

Before you hit me up, I need you to firmly grasp the fact that no, I'm not looking for a fuck buddy, no, I'm not looking to go to a club with you or go get drunk. I'm not looking for the love of my life on here or my soul mate, and if that were to happen that would be amazing but I don't want to be your project or your band aid. I'm not trying to fix you or add more weight onto my shoulders. 

If you message me, message me with good intentions, cause I'm tired, man. 
I won't lie to you, I have a heart of gold and I'm well aware of that. I'm just a stubbornass kid with good intentions. 

I've seen women on here post their zodiac sign so I'll tell ya right now, I'm a libra. 
Be my libroooo? Librahhh?
Not funny? Ok lol. 

Again, scattered thoughts. Bear with me. 

I'm an avid record collector. I'm really proud of my records. I go to shows a lot so a lot of them are signed and chances are that if I like you, I'll ask you to come cuddle and lay in bed with me so I can play my records to you. Haha

Uhm, hmm. When it comes to my preference of women, I'm not picky tbh. I'm attracted to intelligence and strong women. I'm attracted to open minded women with similar interests. Someone who would be down to try new food even though it scares them. Someone who would be down to go hiking on a Sunday morning and stay in and watch scary movies on a Friday night or go to a book store in San Francisco and try a new coffee shop. 

I won't lie, I'm a coffee enthusiast and a hobby of mine is checking out new coffee shops. I recently took this on in January and I've been to hella cool spots. 

I sound like a hipster. 😂

Hmm. More scattered thoughts. I am 420 friendly. I love to ride bikes. Wine is cool sometimes. Rarely though. 

I'm that kid who still laughs at the joke minutes after it's been said. I'm really clumsy. I strongly believe that it takes nothing whatsoever to be kind to one another. We all have shit going on, ya know? We're all fighting our own battles so be kind. 
I used to play the trumpet in a ska band. I can also play the violin. I've always wanted to learn to play the drums. I can't read music for shit, I learned on my own by watching others play. 
I'm really bad at directions and chances are I'll get lost with you at one point in our adventures lol. I speak 3 languages fluently. Spanish. Italian. And English obviously. I'm really awkward, please understand that, not too awkward to the point where it stands out but if you've ever wanted to meet Michael Cera, I'll come ridiculously close. I have a few tattoos. Charles Bukowski is my favorite writer. Making puns is a hobby. 


Hmm,. What else.. I dunno. I feel like I've already bored most of ya, so, if any of you feel like hitting me up, feel free to do so. It wouldn't hurt to meet someone new. Friends are cool. 

And no, dudes, I don't wanna see your chode. 

Kik me? 
whatevsforevss

Yes, that's my username. 

PS; feel the Bern!! :p

title: So...
text:
I guess this is where I tell you about myself and do my best to try and stand out from the rest of the people on here, right? Lol

I should start out by pointing out that I've never posted on here but my best friend keeps insisting that I "put myself out there". So here's my attempt, fellow Craigslisters. 

I'm 22, Mexican American/Italian. White, green eyes, blonde hair, chubby fella with an awkward stance. 
Did that paint a picture in your head about me already? Good. Let's proceed. 

I'd say I'm more "dudeish" I know there's right terms for these things. But I'm fairly new to this all so feel free to educate me on the correct terminology over coffee sometime? :p

But okay, I guess I can be girly sometimes. Rarely though. I'm more of a band tee/button up and skinny jeans sort of girl. 

Did I lose you already? I hope not, bear with me 'cause my thoughts are scattered all over the place and I suck at writing "about me's". 

At the moment, I currently have my own place, a car, going to school, employed, and I would say I have my shit together. 
I just lack that intimacy and that special someone by my side. 

I've never actually been with a girl. I've never even kissed a girl. Or well, that's a lie, I kissed one when I was in 6th grade and that's when I knew girls were for me. Lol

I'm a fairly reserved person, closed off and I keep my walls up. I'm not trying to throw myself a pity party here but I've been hurt a good amount of times and it's just closed me off to the ideas of relationships, ya know? But I feel like I'm ready. I feel like I'm open to meeting someone special that I can share my time with. I feel like that's one of the most valuable things you could give someone. 
You're never gonna get that back, so, spend it with the right person. 

I wouldn't say I'm an introvert because I do love to socialize but only with certain people. I'm a small group sort of girl. I'm into going to book stores, getting coffee, going to shows like punk shows, rock shows, indie shows. Road trips. Hiking. 
I have a pit bull whom I'd say is my son haha. I adore that dog to no end. I'm definitely an animal lover. Did you know cows love to be cuddled? I was watching this dude cuddle cows on tumblr today and it was really cute. 
Cuddle a cow with me so I know it's real. Lol jk. 

I have an awkward sense of humor, I apologize too much, and I'm really affectionate but you won't really see any of these things till I let my walls down with you. 

Before you hit me up, I need you to firmly grasp the fact that no, I'm not looking for a fuck buddy, no, I'm not looking to go to a club with you or go get drunk. I'm not looking for the love of my life on here or my soul mate, and if that were to happen that would be amazing but I don't want to be your project or your band aid. I'm not trying to fix you or add more weight onto my shoulders. 

If you message me, message me with good intentions, cause I'm tired, man. 
I won't lie to you, I have a heart of gold and I'm well aware of that. I'm just a stubbornass kid with good intentions. 

I've seen women on here post their zodiac sign so I'll tell ya right now, I'm a libra. 
Be my libroooo? Librahhh?
Not funny? Ok lol. 

Again, scattered thoughts. Bear with me. 

I'm an avid record collector. I'm really proud of my records. I go to shows a lot so a lot of them are signed and chances are that if I like you, I'll ask you to come cuddle and lay in bed with me so I can play my records to you. Haha

Uhm, hmm. When it comes to my preference of women, I'm not picky tbh. I'm attracted to intelligence and strong women. I'm attracted to open minded women with similar interests. Someone who would be down to try new food even though it scares them. Someone who would be down to go hiking on a Sunday morning and stay in and watch scary movies on a Friday night or go to a book store in San Francisco and try a new coffee shop. 

I won't lie, I'm a coffee enthusiast and a hobby of mine is checking out new coffee shops. I recently took this on in January and I've been to hella cool spots. 

I sound like a hipster. 😂

Hmm. More scattered thoughts. I am 420 friendly. I love to ride bikes. Wine is cool sometimes. Rarely though. 

I'm that kid who still laughs at the joke minutes after it's been said. I'm really clumsy. I strongly believe that it takes nothing whatsoever to be kind to one another. We all have shit going on, ya know? We're all fighting our own battles so be kind. 
I used to play the trumpet in a ska band. I can also play the violin. I've always wanted to learn to play the drums. I can't read music for shit, I learned on my own by watching others play. 
I'm really bad at directions and chances are I'll get lost with you at one point in our adventures lol. I speak 3 languages fluently. Spanish. Italian. And English obviously. I'm really awkward, please understand that, not too awkward to the point where it stands out but if you've ever wanted to meet Michael Cera, I'll come ridiculously close. I have a few tattoos. Charles Bukowski is my favorite writer. Making puns is a hobby. 


Hmm,. What else.. I dunno. I feel like I've already bored most of ya, so, if any of you feel like hitting me up, feel free to do so. It wouldn't hurt to meet someone new. Friends are cool. 

And no, dudes, I don't wanna see your chode. 

Kik me? 
whatevsforevss

Yes, that's my username. 

PS; feel the Bern!! :p

title: Something Real
text:
Ive been in and out of dating sites and I think the problem for me is not explaining exactly what Im looking for in the beginning yet I thought it was self explanatory when someone is looking for a girlfriend. 

So heres a list of exactly what I want and if you think It sounds even remotely someone like you email me. 

1. Im not here to find a fwb, sleep with your man or show you nudes. If you cant love me for my personality then Im not interested. bye Felicia. I feel being intimate with someone is like unwrapping a present and its magical, scary and akward...i dont want to expect anything. 

2. I am a true believer in dating someone before we get into something serious, yes I still believe in love at first sight but in the real world that barely ever happens, a kiss on the first date.Sex on the first date is not who I am. Dont push it. 

3. I cant stand people who cant hold a decent conversation I get alot of hey how are u, im fine.. Then thats it end of conversation forever... If your not interested in me say so and im going to be blunt with you as well, whats the point of lying right? 

4. I want to get married and have kids. If your not ready to make a commitment then its best we don't waste eachothers time. 

5. I am not into taboo, dominatrix, or bi girls. I am fine with girls who have baby daddys, I have one too. If your in a relationship with me we are committed to eachother. If you want someone else then tell me. If your going to cheat tell me. Honesty is all I want in a relationship. 

6. I am a social drinker and I dont smoke cigs... i prefer the same just dont be a chain smoker or an alcoholic please. 

7. You have Money, fancy car, and your own house....i dont care if you have everything or nothing... As long as your taking care of yourself thats all that matters. 

I think I have covered about everything. Hope to hear from you soon!

title: Unapologetic Black Woman in Love
text:
Unapologetic Black Woman in Love

Yes, that's right, I have love for myself and all women of color as I share this honest and heartfelt post.

Dear Sistahs of Color, ever felt you had to duck and bemoan your blackness or culture to appear more appealing?

I've had more than a few women over the years strangely disappear upon discovering this well-spoken, highly educated, resourceful, family focused, blessed with a viable career, healthy and vibrant woman...IS BLACK!

At first I shrugged it off..."oh, they must have lost interest for some other reason."

All the while ignoring the fact that we were practically engaged over email before I raised the infamous question of,
race.

I even recently reached out to make a FRIEND! We emailed numerous times, made tentative plans to hang out, as friends. Platonic. No romance. Just human beings who care about human beings. The email before our visit, I described myself as a woman of color. What did I hear back... Nothing! Disappeared! Emails abruptly stopped! 

People listen deeply...RACISM is alive and well in our communities of origin...in the "liberal" LGBTQ community...on CL....and deep within!

I'm now taking back my power as a proud black woman who loves women!

If you love your self some unapologetic black woman, some beautiful and majestic soft and profoundly unique black woman, some "I love all people," passionate black woman, I'm excited to meet you.

I want to meet you. I ache to meet you!

My desire is to find my way home to the woman of my dreams and never leave her arms!

Period. :)
Exclamation Point! :)

Are you too shy to go out alone?

Well here's your chance! Thursday Night, March 3rd I would like to invite the women of our community to join me and others for an informal happy hour.

Come lounge around with us at "55 South" located at 55 South 1st St located about 300 feet from Splash bar. "55 South" is a lovely cocktail and wine bar offering enjoyable absolutely delicious appetizers. They know how to REALLY make a "Moscow Mule " and Mac & Cheese here!

This is a safe place to meet and mingle with women without the stress of having to carry the conversation! Come one, come all and enjoy a fun night of drinks, dinner and conversation with like-minded gals like you. You never know you might actually like it!

I would kindly like to request our communities support in advertising this event, and really getting the word out there. Feel free to share with your friends , post on Facebook, MeetUp Groups, and other email lists. Come on. . . grab your friends and let's have some fun!

6:00 p.m.to 9 p.m.

55 South

San Jose, CA 95113

title: Just Wondering
text:
I often wonder if REAL women do browse craiglist ads. 

Women who say, "I'm alone, but I'm not lonely," as they take a sip of Cabernet Sauvignon on a chilly Bay Area night. 

Women whose last relationship was so bad that she took time off for herself and now realizes that it's 2016. 

Women who have been too busy working or engaged in other personal endeavors and forgot how being loved by another woman feels. 

Women who look in the mirror and say, "I still got it," and hope to meet someone, but are skeptical about the ads on craiglist. 

Women who can't look at some of the obscene craigslist ads without feeling like this whole dating scene is nuttier than a fruitcake.

About Me:

I'm 5'10", about 150 lbs and can turn a few heads here and there (smile). I have shoulder length dark brown hair, which throws a lot of people off when it comes to my sexuality, and dark brown eyes. 

While I dislike labels, most refer to me as a tomboy or a soft stud. I'm very laid back, somewhat shy, and enjoy the simple things in life. I have my own out-of-state business and am a published lesbian erotica author. Some of my other interest include playing pool, air hockey, going to bookstores, flea markets, amusement parks, taking long drives, and snuggling up with that special woman and watching a movie.

I'm a jeans, T'shirt and tennis shoes/Timberland type of woman, although I have my moments when I will throw on a pair of stretch pants. I'm also a very sexual/passionate individual (giving and receiving).

Oh, just in case race is an issue for you, I'm mixed, but African-American in appearance. If anything I've written sparks your interest, I would love to hear back from you. If I don't then good luck in your search.

Your pic gets mine!

text:

Man!!! What is up with Craig's List?!!! I clearly state what I'm interested in and I get XXX pictures, comments and conversation. . .and a few sad guys (yes, I said sad because they're proselytizing in the women for women section looking for "converts") 

I didn't think I'd be single at this juncture in my life but life often gives the unexpected and I can either do some introspection or become bitter. I'm an upbeat person so I choose to accept the challenges and grow from them.

So far, CL has allowed me women on a full spectrum; I've met women who have been scarred by past relationships and they seemed to be more guarded than optimistic. I've met women who say that CL is not what they want but they've responded to my various posts numerous times. . ..no need to wig out we're all looking, if there's no chemistry there's no chemistry. I just happen to fill a void for companionship. I've also met those women who are more enamored with the idea of being that "bad b" as opposed to being a woman of substance; I cannot get with a woman who tends to believe that material possessions defines them and likes to think that said possessions somehow magically makes them classy. Yeah 'nough said! 

Last but by no means least I've gotten responses from very angry women who feel the need to critique my ad because my requests and preferences are somehow a personal affront to them; again, if there's no chemistry there's no chemistry; we're both on CL hoping to find that spark. Emails, texts and chats are very touching and sweet; a lot can be said and shared but these are very small steps in leading up to what I'm looking for; I'm not looking to have a few clever and witty conversations and then jump in the sack only to try to build something afterwards. title: So...
text:
I guess this is where I tell you about myself and do my best to try and stand out from the rest of the people on here, right? Lol

I should start out by pointing out that I've never posted on here but my best friend keeps insisting that I "put myself out there". So here's my attempt, fellow Craigslisters. 

I'm 22, Mexican American/Italian. White, green eyes, blonde hair, chubby fella with an awkward stance. 
Did that paint a picture in your head about me already? Good. Let's proceed. 

I'd say I'm more "dudeish" I know there's right terms for these things. But I'm fairly new to this all so feel free to educate me on the correct terminology over coffee sometime? :p

But okay, I guess I can be girly sometimes. Rarely though. I'm more of a band tee/button up and skinny jeans sort of girl. 

Did I lose you already? I hope not, bear with me 'cause my thoughts are scattered all over the place and I suck at writing "about me's". 

At the moment, I currently have my own place, a car, going to school, employed, and I would say I have my shit together. 
I just lack that intimacy and that special someone by my side. 

I've never actually been with a girl. I've never even kissed a girl. Or well, that's a lie, I kissed one when I was in 6th grade and that's when I knew girls were for me. Lol

I'm a fairly reserved person, closed off and I keep my walls up. I'm not trying to throw myself a pity party here but I've been hurt a good amount of times and it's just closed me off to the ideas of relationships, ya know? But I feel like I'm ready. I feel like I'm open to meeting someone special that I can share my time with. I feel like that's one of the most valuable things you could give someone. 
You're never gonna get that back, so, spend it with the right person. 

I wouldn't say I'm an introvert because I do love to socialize but only with certain people. I'm a small group sort of girl. I'm into going to book stores, getting coffee, going to shows like punk shows, rock shows, indie shows. Road trips. Hiking. 
I have a pit bull whom I'd say is my son haha. I adore that dog to no end. I'm definitely an animal lover. Did you know cows love to be cuddled? I was watching this dude cuddle cows on tumblr today and it was really cute. 
Cuddle a cow with me so I know it's real. Lol jk. 

I have an awkward sense of humor, I apologize too much, and I'm really affectionate but you won't really see any of these things till I let my walls down with you. 

Before you hit me up, I need you to firmly grasp the fact that no, I'm not looking for a fuck buddy, no, I'm not looking to go to a club with you or go get drunk. I'm not looking for the love of my life on here or my soul mate, and if that were to happen that would be amazing but I don't want to be your project or your band aid. I'm not trying to fix you or add more weight onto my shoulders. 

If you message me, message me with good intentions, cause I'm tired, man. 
I won't lie to you, I have a heart of gold and I'm well aware of that. I'm just a stubbornass kid with good intentions. 

I've seen women on here post their zodiac sign so I'll tell ya right now, I'm a libra. 
Be my libroooo? Librahhh?
Not funny? Ok lol. 

Again, scattered thoughts. Bear with me. 

I'm an avid record collector. I'm really proud of my records. I go to shows a lot so a lot of them are signed and chances are that if I like you, I'll ask you to come cuddle and lay in bed with me so I can play my records to you. Haha

Uhm, hmm. When it comes to my preference of women, I'm not picky tbh. I'm attracted to intelligence and strong women. I'm attracted to open minded women with similar interests. Someone who would be down to try new food even though it scares them. Someone who would be down to go hiking on a Sunday morning and stay in and watch scary movies on a Friday night or go to a book store in San Francisco and try a new coffee shop. 

I won't lie, I'm a coffee enthusiast and a hobby of mine is checking out new coffee shops. I recently took this on in January and I've been to hella cool spots. 

I sound like a hipster. 😂

Hmm. More scattered thoughts. I am 420 friendly. I love to ride bikes. Wine is cool sometimes. Rarely though. 

I'm that kid who still laughs at the joke minutes after it's been said. I'm really clumsy. I strongly believe that it takes nothing whatsoever to be kind to one another. We all have shit going on, ya know? We're all fighting our own battles so be kind. 
I used to play the trumpet in a ska band. I can also play the violin. I've always wanted to learn to play the drums. I can't read music for shit, I learned on my own by watching others play. 
I'm really bad at directions and chances are I'll get lost with you at one point in our adventures lol. I speak 3 languages fluently. Spanish. Italian. And English obviously. I'm really awkward, please understand that, not too awkward to the point where it stands out but if you've ever wanted to meet Michael Cera, I'll come ridiculously close. I have a few tattoos. Charles Bukowski is my favorite writer. Making puns is a hobby. 


Hmm,. What else.. I dunno. I feel like I've already bored most of ya, so, if any of you feel like hitting me up, feel free to do so. It wouldn't hurt to meet someone new. Friends are cool. 

And no, dudes, I don't wanna see your chode. 

Kik me? 
whatevsforevss

Yes, that's my username. 

PS; feel the Bern!! :p

title: Moving to SF. Maybe by winter
text:
Wanting to relocate 
Hi there. I'm a 63 yr old GWF, looking for another woman, for companionship, and partnership. Right now, I live in PA, but wanting to recolate. Wanting someone to share my life with. I am not seeking a sexual relationship, at this time. But I do like affection, and romance. I'm young at heart, looks, and lifestyle. It seems i am older then most on here, so i'm not sure about this way of trying to find someone, but since i live in a small town, and don't like bars, i don't really have many ways to connect with other woman. Maybe i'll find someone in a similar situation. I want someone available to put time and energy into a new person. NOT looking for someone far away, or who's real busy, or tied up with work, or friends, and family. Wanting to meet someone who is on their own, with free time, and places our time first. I like to hang out, and get cozy at home. At home we can dance, watch good movies, make healthy meals, read metaphysical books, listen to meditation tapes, and grow together through these teachings. I'm looking for someone between 45 & 68. I'm not a city person. I like the country and nature. I love long heart to heart talks, in person, or on the phone. I like to take walks. I'm a free thinker. I am also very much a homebody, but also enjoy the malls, department stores, supermarkets, book stores, library, park and beach. I'm health conscious, and looking for someone who is also. I am interested in Metaphysics, and Christanity, without the Dogma, and looking for someone to share that with. Eating healthy, and exercising. I'm down to earth, kind and loving, and very supportive. I am looking to find someone , who is non judgemental, and understanding, open minded, and not the jealous type. Relationships, should add to your life, not take away from it. Also, needing someone, that if an issue comes up, we can work through it together, instead of running away, and giving up, at the first sign of trouble. No security, with this kind of person. Need someone who is available to spend alot of time together. So lets talk on the phone first, exchange pictures, and seeing if we have enough in common, and make a connection. From there, we can meet eventually in person, but for now, on Skype, and see how we feel then. If we connect, see if we get along, and are compatable, and if there is a chemestry between us. I always look at the heart of a person (the good qualities). Also a good sense of humor is important. But a good heart is even better, and I do not judge by looks. I myself, have alot of love to give. I like someone who is laid back, and feminine, in a down to earth way, and medium built. Not wanting someone, too thin, or to stocky. No butches, please, or femmes, with butch sides to their character. I am fem-not butch. I'm real, natural, and honest, and looking for the same. I am spiritual, into metaphysics, and I'm a Jew for Jesus. Thanks for reading. I am clean and sober hippy type. BE CLEAN, SOBER, & A NON SMOKER! I am also seeking more close friends. I have alot of phone friends, but only one close person, that I see, and not very often.

title: Intellectual Dominant Women?
text:
It seems a naive and desperate experiment to try and post something more of substance than the usual shallow fare that makes up Craigslist personals, but here I am. As for my subject title, I personally eschew smug self-identifications like "intellectual" and instead identify as a reasonably intelligent person, but I thought the word "intellectual" might succinctly call attention to this ad. Yes, I hope to find other reasonably intelligent women - surely, some intelligent women browse through this site and then shrug their shoulders in disappointment. As for my criteria for intelligence: You don't have to be erudite scholar who has memorized ancient manuscripts of Horace in Latin nor do you need to have a command over logic via Frege nor a voracious penchant for reading Proust. But I hope to find someone who cares about various subjects that make up the humanities and social sciences and who has social/political activist concerns. I also am looking for someone who values autodidactism and who has been through enough of academia to appreciate what good they got out of it while critical of its ivory tower elitism. As for my preference to find a "dominant" woman, I mean that I prefer someone who is assertive, somewhat stern, demonstratively self-confident, enjoys teaching and guiding and disciplining, and who enjoys taking lead, though not entirely in a master-like controlling way demanding complete and total subservience from me. A combination of frighteningly stern and dominant and yet very gentle, loving and empathetic towards my needs and preferences is ideal. I like being bossed around but only by someone who does not lose sight of the bossing being a playful, consensual exercise instead of a seriously controlling, one-sided one. I am very new to this scene and prefer someone who is either experienced being a "dom" to a "sub" or who hasn't done it much or at all but who fits the personality description I have described. 

I am in my twenties. I am about 5 foot, curvy/thick (not thin, not big), rounded baby face, light brown/olive skin, dark ambiguous ethnic features, dark thick eyebrows, big brown eyes, have medium-long dark hair, and generally sport a feminine style attire-wise and like to wear make-up. 

I hope to find someone who can host movie nights at their apartment. I love movies, old and new, critically acclaimed and overlooked. I also like someone who would enjoy cooking for me - I would help you prep the meal and I would also do the dishes. I also enjoy interior design and cleaning and rearranging and would love to help you change your apartment around and be put to task for hours if that's what you wanted. I also enjoy tagging along for errands. I also want someone who enjoys driving and someone who would enjoy taking me out for long rides in their car with good music or even better just really good conversation. I'd like to be taken out to various movie theatres, thrift stores, boutiques, and restaurants. Someone I can talk to for hours is really important. I am a strong need to have an emotionally intimate connection built on hours of introspective, psycho-analytic exchanges. I like someone who will let me into their deepest thoughts, sorrows, aspirations, ambitions, humiliations, mistakes, and who cares to thoroughly explore my mind in a similar capacity as well. I do suffer from chronic depression and am looking for someone who has significant insight into that and who is happily willing to provide continuous support and not react with condescension or derision to mental illness. I want someone who has enough time and devotion to be in regular contact via text and who can meet semi-regularly or talk on the phone when they cannot meet. I also tend to have a lot of insecurities and doubts and so I am looking for a nurturing personality who will be careful not to get so annoyed nor feel burdened when I express these things and who will feel inclined to provide reassurances when I seem to need them. I can be affectionate and crave affection on a level that some might characterize as clingy or needy -- I do desire to be held quite often, and seem to have an insatiable appetite for receiving consoling gestures like a gentle patting on my back or my arm, etc., pacifying gestures that remind me to feel better or calm down. I am of course interested in reciprocating the same when it seems you need it or to do it at times just to show how much I care. Affectionate scenarios I truly enjoy include being curled up into someone's chest, resting my head on someone's shoulder, or sometimes most of all sitting in someone's lap, etc. I also enjoy light cuddling in restaurants and holding hands in public in general, and holding hands while someone is driving. 

I thought I would also list some of my admittedly pretentious but earnest academic/intellectual interests: journalism, social welfare, sociology (an intersectional perspective that accounts for race, class, sexuality and other social stigma), doing archival/historical research, rhetoric/argumentation, social activist efforts, ethnic and gender studies, African diaspora studies, Asian diaspora studies, history (early to present U.S., medieval to modern Europe, South Asia and the Middle East, the ancient Near East, etc.,) political science (early to present party ideology and party politics, voter habits, race and gender in party politics), critiquing ideologues and pop culture, film studies, comparative literature (deconstruction, literary theory, semiotics, the activity of interpretation/comparing interpretation methods, assessing which and why what literary interpretations are more optimal than others, comparing Enlightenment era thinkers, etc.), philosophy (have been largely unsuccessful with Kant, Wittgenstein, Frege and many others,) etc.

Well, please respond letting me know your age (even if age is a kind of trivial concept), as well as a physical description if you feel comfortable and not disgusted by the implied shallowness in my asking for this, a personality description, your hobbies, what you do for work/school, what experience you have being a "dom" if any, what you envision for us getting to know one another, what you're willing to offer, what your idea of an ideal outing would be, etc. I enjoy writer-types so feel free to write at length. I enjoy poignant thoughtful detail and a hyper-analytical voice in writing , as well as an eclectic sense of humor that ranges from dry and caustic to goofy and pubescent. I like the endearing bitterness of writers like Allen Ginsberg, the weirdness of Gertrude Stein, the severely detailed introspective melodramatic voice of Proust and Virginia Woolf, as well as Oscar Wilde's command for epigram. I like many styles of writing really. Perhaps we could start the correspondence by exchanging a few enticing letters.

title: If music be the food of love.....play on
text:
Keeping it real, I've run a few ads and I've the thing that I've discovered is that the ads with song lyrics have opened the door to conversation with a few very lovely ladies (some more than once. . ..which lets me know there are women seeking to find something lasting). The conversations were light and breezy because of the song. . .no love connection yet, but I remain undaunted, I just haven't selected a song from my mental jukebox that touches that special someone's soul. Until that happens I'll write, post and wait patiently for her to feel the font and dance through my mind.

I love WOMEN plain and simple: WOMEN who KNOW what it means to be a woman and she embraces all that femininity brings . . . I've met a couple of very nice women on CL. I'm grateful that CL allows me to be specific , but . . .it also has its down side in that people respond without reading the ad or I'm chatting with the same people multiple times. . ..even when it happens I am respectful to all. 

The thing is, too many women have been scarred by past relationships and they seemed to be more guarded than optimistic; I don't blame you ladies, I get it. . ..emotional hurt and pain erodes trust and it takes a long time to heal. My dilemma is that I seem to fill a void for companionship. Emails, texts and chats are very touching and sweet; a lot can be said and shared but these are very small steps in leading up to what I'm looking for; I not looking to have a few clever and witty conversations and then jump in the sack only to try to build something afterwards; I want to come out of the "friend zone" to something long term and substantial. I don't want to be the beater car and "crash test " dummy that you use to vent, cry and beat up on until you can drive away. . ..you get what I'm sayin' here? I'm not at all angry about the process I can thank God for the "blessons" (blessings+lessons). I can acknowledge that I am a better person for having gone through each experience. . .just want you ladies to know that sometimes through all the chaos both people are vulnerable, even when you can't see it.

I'm looking for a designer original, something real, something with the potential for long term: About you, FEM OF COLOR, 35-50 years old. I'm attracted to women who appreciate the butch/fem dynamic. I'm also attracted to women who are kind,classy, kind, intelligent, well read and well spoken, kind, spiritual, kid, polite, patient. did I mention kind heh heh heh

A little about me, soft butch, average height, average physique, soft spoken, pretty laid back and chill for the most part; I can't and don't like a lot of arguing and drama. I'm college educated. I appreciate good book, movies, theater, music (the arts in general.) I'm looking for someone who can be content with a night of Netflix as well as a night on the town..

Please no men, couples, bi or BBW . Please be d/d free, no 420, no smoking.

title: Looking For A New Best Friend and More..
text:
